title: Create A PBE Account (something went wrong)
body:
I recently got an email that I got accepted into PBE. I clicked on the link that should have put me to the place where you are to make an account and at the top it said something went wrong and showed the Mad Scientist Skin for Heimerdinger splash art. I scrolled down everything was there but disorganized. I saw where you are supposed to put the information of you new account and I put everything in. I pressed finished register and nothing happened it just put me on the top of the screen and it refreshed. Someone help me please.

Here's the link: https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup

replies.body:
It sounds like you might be having some sort of web browser issue. My first suggestion would be to see if clearing your browser [**history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) helps out. 

Since you've already tried that, let's see if you're able to get the PBE signup page to work in a different browser.

Ok. I just checked with my friends and they also said that the website shows that they have been accepted even though they didn't send an application in. Is this a glitch or is it like this just for us?

Hmmmm that's interesting that they got an acceptance letter but never applied. They may have received that email unintentionally, but we can always double check if they reach out to us.

If you still can't get onto the website to sign up, reach out to us in a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into your issue one on one.
what does clearing your history and cookies do anyways?

When you try to pull up a website that stores data for future use, it'll store that data as a 'cookie'. When you go back to that site, it pulls the data from those cookies to put you back where you left off. Sometimes that can cause issues with the site if it doesn't load that info correctly. 

By clearing your cookies, it can kind of refresh your history with that website.
I've tried explorer, safari, and chrome and it doesn't work. I'be also tried using my phone to make an account and it doesn't work.
Have you tried clearing your cookies?
What does that do? Nothing happened.
